The CEOs were dissatisfied with the app’s quality, and the customer experience team received a lot of negative feedback from the test users. } />, Initial challenges: The primary challenge was clarifying and communicating the need for a full redesign. } />, , In this context, I seized the opportunity to take initiative,{' '} proactively leading a comprehensive revamp project {' '} with a proper design thinking process and{' '} establishing a UX strategy for the product. } />, My role: 80% of the time I worked as the solo designer on this project. In the final month, a second designer joined me to accelerate the development preparations, which included creating some of the UI kit components and additional scenarios. I supervised and managed both these tasks. } />, Project goals: A full-scale application revamp. New visual style.
